ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.vdisk

Interface IVirtualDirectory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<IVirtualDiskEntry>, IVirtualDiskEntry
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VirtualDirectory

    public interface IVirtualDirectory
extends IVirtualDiskEntry
    Represents a directory on the virtual disk. A directory contains members (IVirtualDiskEntry) which belong to the directory. This includes files and subdirectories inside the directory. As defined by the IVirtualDiskEntry the member list is a doubly linked list.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMember(IVirtualDiskEntry member)
      Adds the given member to the list.
      IVirtualDiskEntry getFirstMember()
      Returns the first member of the list.
      void removeMember(IVirtualDiskEntry member)
      Removes the given member from the directory.

      • removeMember

        void removeMember(IVirtualDiskEntry member)
                  throws VirtualDiskException,
                         IOException
        Removes the given member from the directory.
        Parameters:
        member - member to remove from the directory
        Throws:
        VirtualDiskException - if the member is not part of this directory
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
